arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ONEROUS_CONS_NO\\" AS \\"ONEROUS_CONS_NO\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"VEND_CD\\" AS \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"LOT_NO\\" AS \\"LOT_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.ISSUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"ISSUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ISSUE_QTY\\") AS \\"ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"UNIT_COST\\") AS \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"VEND_LOT_NO\\" AS \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\" AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"RETURNED_WH_CD\\" AS \\"RETURNED_WH_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"RETURNED_CAUSE_CD\\" AS \\"RETURNED_CAUSE_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" AS \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\") AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" AS \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" AS \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" T1.VALUE AS \\"RETURNED_GNR_TYP_DN\\", " +" T2.VALUE AS \\"AP_PROC_TYP_DN\\", " +" T3.VALUE AS \\"UNIT_COST_DN\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" AS \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WH, " +" M_CUR, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'RETURNED_GNR_TYP' " +" ) T1, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'AP_PROC_TYP' " +" ) T2, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'UNIT_COST_TYP' " +" ) T3 " +"WHERE " +" M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.COMPANY_CD " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.VEND_CD " +" AND M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.ITEM_CD " +" AND M_WH.WH_CD(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.RETURNED_WH_CD " +" AND M_CUR.CUR_CD(+) = M_VEND_CTRL.CUR_CD " +" AND T1.VALUE(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.RETURNED_GNR_TYP " +" AND T2.VALUE(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.AP_PROC_TYP " +" AND T3.VALUE(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.UNIT_COST_TYP " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ISSUE_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE(?) " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ISSUE_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?) " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ONEROUS_CONS_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"RETURNED_GNR_TYP\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"RETURNED_GNR_TYP\\" != ? " +"ORDER BY " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"VEND_CD\\", " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ITEM_CD\\""

"select " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" count(1) " +"FROM " +" T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WH, " +" M_CUR, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'RETURNED_GNR_TYP' " +" ) T1, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'AP_PROC_TYP' " +" ) T2, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'UNIT_COST_TYP' " +" ) T3 " +"WHERE " +" M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.COMPANY_CD " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.VEND_CD " +" AND M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.ITEM_CD " +" AND M_WH.WH_CD(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.RETURNED_WH_CD " +" AND M_CUR.CUR_CD(+) = M_VEND_CTRL.CUR_CD " +" AND T1.VALUE(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.RETURNED_GNR_TYP " +" AND T2.VALUE(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.AP_PROC_TYP " +" AND T3.VALUE(+) = T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.UNIT_COST_TYP " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ISSUE_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE(?) " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ISSUE_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?) " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"ONEROUS_CONS_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"RETURNED_GNR_TYP\\" = ? " +" AND T_PAST_ONEROUS_CONS.\\"RETURNED_GNR_TYP\\" != ? " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"
